ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( Listing_hz__c == null, Listing_hz__c == '' ), OR( Account__c == null, Account__c == '' ), OR( Action__c == null, Action__c == '' ), OR( Contact__c == null, Contact__c == '' ), OR( LinkedListing_hz__c == null, LinkedListing_hz__c == '' ), OR( Closing_hz__c == null, Closing_hz__c == '' ), OR( Offer_hz__c == null, Offer_hz__c == '' ), OR( Property_hz__c == null, Property_hz__c == '' ), OR( PropertyMedia__c == null, PropertyMedia__c == '' ), OR( Inquiry_hz__c == null, Inquiry_hz__c == '' ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must relate the Action Plan to an object. Select the type and the object, then save again.
